author: djencks
msg: Intermediate checkin separating most protocol servers lifecycle from ApacheDS.  This includes 2 versions of the NTP server in the hopes code will help discussion of which alternative is better.  Several classes need to be renamed based on the outcome of this discussion.

author: imario
msg: fixed custom manifest entries, fixed scope of shared

author: jacopoc
msg: 1) replaced the logic inside the isEmail method with a call to org.apache.commons.validator.EmailValidator.isValid(...)
2) I've left the code that returns true if the string is empty
3) the only remarkable difference is that the original code was accepting (by default) a domain without dots (user@localhost); the new code requires a real domain (user@domain.com)
Thanks to John Martin for the advices.

author: smishura
msg: Apply patch for exclude list from HARMONY-4868:
([drlvm][jdwp] Intermittent failure of JDWP unit tests RefTypeIDTest, ClassObjectIDTes)

author: fielding
msg: Jump table from RFC 2616 outline to partitioned draft sections.
